abstract_summ: There is rising global concern for the recently emerged novel coronavirus (2019-nCov) Full genomic sequences have been released by the worldwide scientific community in the last few weeks to understand the evolutionary origin and molecular characteristics of this virus . We confirm high sequence similarity between all sequenced 2019-nCoVs genomes available, with the closest BCoV sequence sharing 96.2% sequence identity, confirming the notion of a zoonotic origin .
